Wave and tidal energy are #Drawdown #climate solutions. https://t.co/oAtD0L3A1e

Wave- and tidal-energy systems harness natural oceanic flows to generate electricity. A #Drawdown climate solution, wave & tidal energy is currently the most expensive of all renewables. Still, the opportunity of marine-based energy is massive. https://t.co/Hlu9qR5BFV

Today's power grid was designed for constant, centralized power production, not for the variability of solar and wind power. For electricity supply to become predominantly renewable, the grid needs to be more flexible and adaptable than it is now. https://t.co/yjQLwtspjB

Distributed #energy storage is an essential supporting technology for many Drawdown #climate solutions.

Microgrids, net zero buildings, grid flexibility, and rooftop solar all depend on or are amplified by dispersed storage systems. More... https://t.co/tayqdLyivM

Biomass energy is a #Drawdown ‚Äúbridge‚Äù solution‚Äîone that can help the world transition from fossil-fuel power to 100% clean, renewable energy. Learn more...

"A better path is still possible. May we turn that possibility into reality." 8/8

Closing words of the #DrawdownReview.

"...to the world we want for ourselves, for all of life, and for generations yet to come. With commitment, collaboration, and ingenuity, we can depart the perilous path we are on and come back into balance with the planet‚Äôs living systems. 7/8

"At times, this can all feel like a draconian assignment. But it‚Äôs also an invitation into deeply meaningful work. Our purpose as human beings in this moment is to create a livable future, together‚Äîto build a bridge from where we are today... 6/8
"This time of transformation also asks that we learn from cultures and communities that have sustained human-nature symbiosis for centuries, even millennia. 5/8
"Genuine evolution is in order‚Äîevolution in what we value, how we treat one another, who holds the reins of power, the ways institutions operate, and the very contours of our economies. 4/8

"Who will we choose to be in this pivotal moment of human history? A transformation that moves us toward Drawdown is possible...but it will require much more than the right technologies and practices being available. 3/8

"Will we employ collective courage and determination and the legion of existing solutions to move the world away from widespread climate catastrophe? Will we pursue climate action in ways that heal systemic injustices and foster resilience, wellbeing, and equality? 2/8

"We are living in a time of dramatic transformation. The basic physics, chemistry, and biology of this planet make that non-negotiable; stasis is not an option. Society has a choice to make about what shape that transformation will take. 1/8
